how-it-works.html.a: We source, assess and secure investment properties nationwide using data-led shortlisting and expert negotiation. You get a de-risked, end-to-end process.
We prioritise markets with tight vacancy, rising rents, improving listings/DOM and sustainable demand drivers. Signals are reviewed weekly across AU cities and regions.

how-it-works.html.q: Do you help with finance, PM and conveyancing?
how-it-works.html.a: Yes. We coordinate the buying journey with your broker, conveyancer and property manager to keep contracts, inspections and settlement on track.

how-it-works.html.q: What kinds of properties do you target?
how-it-works.html.a: Established houses and townhomes in undersupplied suburbs with strong rentability and value-add potential. We avoid oversupplied stock and risky projects.

how-it-works.html.q: How long does it take to purchase?
how-it-works.html.a: Typical engagements run 4–10 weeks depending on brief, budget and market conditions. We keep you informed at each step with shortlists and rationale.

pricing.html.a: Transparent fixed fees with no hidden extras. You know your cost upfront, and our money-back guarantee applies if we don’t deliver as agreed.
Yes. If you’re not satisfied with our service, you’re covered by our guarantee. See the Guarantee page for full details and conditions.
Briefing, market selection, property shortlisting, inspections, analysis, negotiation strategy and contract support through to settlement.
Third‑party costs like building & pest, conveyancing and lender fees are separate. We’ll outline recommended providers and typical ranges.

pricing.html.q: Do you work with interstate buyers?
pricing.html.a: Yes. Most clients are interstate. Our process is designed for remote execution with clear updates and video walkthroughs.
